title: Covid-19 Vaccine Frequently Asked Questions
content:
Stay home and away from others
(including people you live with who are not sick) if you have a respiratory virus. You can go back to your normal activities when, for at least 24 hours, both are true:
Your symptoms are getting better overall,
and
You have not had a fever (and are not using fever-reducing medication).
When you go back to your normal activities, take added precaution over the next 5 days, such as taking additional
steps for cleaner air
, hygiene,
masks
,
physical distancing
